title: Dreams Las Mareas Costa Rica Offers New Golf Package
text:
Allowing members to see two countries during their stay
For a golf getaway with beautiful beaches and an international flavor, Unlimited Vacation Club (UVC) members can now book the Dreams Las Mareas Golf Package during their stay at Dreams® Las Mareas Costa Rica .
Dreams Las Mareas, part of the elite Unlimited Vacation Club (UVC) by AMResorts portfolio, welcomes members with this package that includes a round of golf at Guacalito Golf Course in the neighboring country of Nicaragua. The famous 18-hole course, designed by David McLay Kidd, is located in Guacalito de la Isla, only a short two-hour drive from the resort. UVC members can see two countries during their stay and tee off at this sustainable golf course surrounded by ocean and jungle for an incredible price. Golfers can even bring a non-golfer companion for a discounted price, allowing them to see this gorgeous country. Pricing and terms & conditions can be found on the Special Offers page on UnlimitedVacationClub.com .
The Dreams Las Mareas Golf Package includes:
· Greens fees for 18 holes and golf cart
· Round-trip shared transfer from Dreams Las Mareas (minimum of four guests)
· Arrival & departure taxes for Nicaragua and Costa Rica
· Callaway Razr-X golf clubs
· Four domestic drinks
· Lunch
Surf, Sand and Spa
A visit to Dreams Las Mareas Cost Rica offers the opportunity for luxury and adventure at this contemporary resort set on the expansive, palm-studded Playa El Jobo on Guanacaste’s Northern Coast. Members can enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® program, where everything is included: gourmet dining options with no reservations required, limitless top-shelf spirits at oceanfront bars, endless daytime activities, live nightly entertainment, 24-hour room and concierge services, and more.
Dreams Las Mareas houses 447 elegant guest suites with private terraces featuring Jacuzzis or swim-out access and sweeping views of the ocean, jungle or mountains. Dreams Las Mareas takes members on culinary adventures by way of its eight dining options. Members can enjoy international, gourmet cuisine at one of five à la carte restaurants and a buffet, while casual dining options are offered during the day at the Coco Café or Barefoot Grill. Afterwards, members can relax with a cocktail at one of the resort’s seven festive bars and lounges.
Dreams Las Mareas boasts endless activities during the day for those who would like to be active or simply relax. Leisure-lovers can enjoy two oceanfront swimming pools and a steaming whirlpool, while the kids slide down the “La Cascada” waterslide. There is also an array of non-motorized watersports and land activities for all ages. The fun continues after the sun goes down. There are big screen movies on the beach, nightly themed parties with live entertainment, and so much more. The Explorer’s Club for kids and Core Zone Teen’s Club offer fun, supervised activities, while adults can relax at the beach or pamper themselves with treatments at the Dreams Spa by Pevonia®. Exciting tours and excursions also are available for guests to explore all that the Guanacaste Province has to offer through Amstar.
In addition to this beautiful family-friendly resort, a new option for luxury and leisure is coming to Costa Rica this November – Secrets® Papagayo Costa Rica. This adults-only resort is set on Papagayo Beach along the Pacific Coast of Costa Rica. It will boast a black volcanic-sand beach and will offer the Unlimited-Luxury® program. Secrets Papagayo will offer 202 spacious suites with private terraces, 24-hour room service, four restaurants and one café, as well as five relaxing bars. Members will be able to enjoy the natural scenery and attractions of Costa Rica and the Guanacaste Coast by visiting the Marina Papagayo, located nearby, which boasts world-class sport fishing, a pedestrian village, gardens and picturesque walkways. An unparalleled experience awaits at Secrets Papagayo, just 20 minutes from Liberia Airport and 30 minutes from downtown Liberia.
For more information about UVC and the resorts in Costa Rica, visit www.unlimitedvacationclub.com .
About Unlimited Vacation Club
Unlimited Vacation Club by AMResorts is an exclusive travel club providing VIP privileges at luxurious AMResorts properties throughout Mexico, the Caribbean and Costa Rica. Members can enjoy preferred rates, free nights and access to exclusive partner offers. AMResorts brands offer a variety of upscale travel experiences, from romantic, adults-only destination resorts to wellness retreats and family-friendly properties. Located in exquisite tropical settings, the resorts deliver endless luxuries, from pristine beaches, premier culinary programs and elegantly appointed guestrooms and suites to luxurious spas, nightly entertainment and scores of daytime activities. For more information, visit www.unlimitedvacationclub.com .
